Reviews.Title: The Reason for the Mixed Reviews
Reviews.Author: Tim Naff "Tim"
Reviews.Content: Are you confused by the most polarized set of reviews on Amazon?  I was.  Some said it took wonderful pictures; some said it took terrible pictures.  It was as though half the cameras were defective.  They weren't and they aren't.  Here's the deal:  this camera is a little more prone to bluring than some other, mostly larger, cameras.  In technical terms, it has only one aperture setting, and it's pretty wide, which means the depth of the image that is in focus is somewhat shallow.  Also, the sensor is not the most sensitive, so, even with the large aperture, it needs plenty of light or it will set for longer exposures and get bluring from camera shake.  Finally, the built-in image stabilization is limited and will only help if you don't shake it much.  This all adds up to a tendency to take blurry pictures, especially indoors.So with all that, why did I give it four stars?  Because the little camera is fully capable of taking sharp pictures.  Believe me when I say I know what sharp pictures are:  I have an A850 with a Zeiss 24-70 lens.  I also have an excellent (and highly recommended) DSC-100 with Zeiss optics, two aperture settings, and the option of full manual control.The first pictures I tried with the DSC-180W were indoors in available light (no flash).  The results were abysmal.  The next thing I tried was using the flash.  The results were mixed, because the camera's autofocus system was confused by the complex scene, and the depth of focus is shallow.  Then, still indoors, I aimed at something fairly flat with the flash, and voila, it produced a picture sharp enough that it took full advantage of all the pixels.  That's all the resolution you can ask for.  I tried it at long range and short range, with zoom and wide-angle, and continued to get good results.The next day, I took it outdoors along with my DSC-100 and shot a number of scenes with both cameras for comparison.  The DSC-180W did well.  It was a little more contrasty than the 100, and the colors were a little more saturated, both of which I attribute to in-camera processing.  I put the images into Photoshop and was able to extract the shadow detail that had been lost to the contrast.  Of course, the 180W's more contrasty, saturated pictures looked better in some ways.  Saturation aside, the two cameras agreed well on color rendition, indicating no major chromatic aberation.Understand that I was looking at these images on a 24 inch monitor and then blowing them up even more.  And I've shot some amazing things with the DSC-100, which, when new, cost four times what the 180W costs today.  Used DSC-100s command rediculously high prices today for what they are.  My point is that I was not easy on the 180W.Other notes:  The screen is very bright.  You have to press the shutter button harder than I'm used to, so squeeze when you shoot, or you'll create camera shake.I gave the camera four starts, because it's a good deal for the dollar.  It's way more compact than the 100.  If you buy it, don't set unrealistic expectations.  Shooting indoors, use the flash (which will only work on fairly close subjects) or use a tripod or set it on a bean bag.  Don't shoot into complex scenes of varying distances and expect it to put everything into simultaneous focus.  You CAN have high expectations when you shoot landscapes and almost anything outdoors from a reasonable distance. Depth of focus grows with the distance from the camera.  The optics are not bad, in spite of what some reviewers have said.  I got good resolution many times in many circumstances, so the optics are just fine. Those reviewers caused the bluring with camera shake and focus issues, just as I did on my first few shots.I bought this camera for my wife so that she could do some independent picture taking on our upcoming trip to Europe.  I could have sent it back, but I decided it was a keeper.I hope this helps you with your decision.Update:  After 18 months, my wife still enjoys using the camera and doesn't want to trade it in for a later model.  She has made some superb shots with it.Tim

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: B. Knapp "Knapper"
Reviews.Content: The Camera is great for the price. It takes wonderful pictures and video's. The other reviews are false that say the picture quality is bad. The picture quality is very good, I love this camera. Three things you look for in a camera: Great pictures, Portability, and Easy to use. This camera has all three!!

Reviews.Title: the worst photo quality ever
Reviews.Author: K. Kinakin
Reviews.Content: I can't believe they released this camera with such a crappy lens.... this is the one model that DOESN"T have a Carl Zeiss lens.... for this model they made a Sony lens... who's even heard of that?.. .of course the next model went back to a Carl Zeiss because they realized what a mistake they madeThe photos look fine in your viewer on the camera - but as soon as you put them on your computer you'll see just how amazingly out of focus the photos are... NOTHING is sharp... and it over saturates the colors. I tried every setting and i might get 1 out of every 10 photos in focus... and again, it looks good on the camera, but when i import them.. i end up trashing them all and it's very disappointing. I'm a graphic designer by trade - and while I was only looking at this for personal snap and shoot opportunities... i know i could trust my old camera... but not this one.also the delay time in between being able to take shots is incredibly long and slow.I know this camera was on sale, and I previously had a Sony Cybershot (wtih a Carl Zeiss lens) and loved it. this has left a bad taste in my mouth. avoid this specific model at all costs unless you want to throw money down the toilet.grrrrrrrrrr

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Nq "Nq"
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert in digital cameras and cannot compare this camera to other brands, but for my personal use it is fantastic, I love it. It is easy to use and the picture quality is very good. Of course, as usual, Amazon delivered the camera in excellent condition. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Miguel Morales
Reviews.Content: Honestly, I was a little skeptical at first about this camera because of the bad reviews it got. Upon receiving the camera, it looked great and functioned well. It was pretty easy to use and was very light. A lot of people gave the camera bad reviews for the picture quality, i disagree. The picture quality was amazing. It took excellent pictures, even in the dark. For the price, its definitely one of the best cameras you can buy.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!  Great camera, great features, great price!
Reviews.Author: Jamie Bullock "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: My old camera died after almost 6 years... I loved the ease of use on that one... it was a sony cybershot. 5.0...  I wanted a similar camera but with better technology :)  I love the fact that you don't have to fool with AA batteries.... the battery recharges quickly and easily.... I like the battery charger on this camera... no cords to fool with or look for and figure what goes with what.  I get great pictures on this camera, it has a steady shot.... even takes great night pictures, or pictures thru glass without me having to readjust the flash or other settings.... great time saver... I have 3 small kids and on the go.  I can capture the memories with little fuss!

Reviews.Title: Just Don't Buy It
Reviews.Author: Avaleen A. Morris "wisdomseeker"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this camera if you want to capture important once in a lifetime moments.  This camera is a waste of time and money.  I met Dr. Ben Carson and went up to take a photo with him and his wife there was a long line (as you can imagine) and I had a chance to get only one shot and it was AWFUL! All of us looked yellowy-orange, our faces were washed out from the flash and the remainder of the picture was dark even though the room we were in was well lit.I have to retake a photo at least 3-5 times EVERYTIME to get a decent shot.  To be fair, the video camera has pretty good image quality but the mic is located on the UNDERSIDE of the camera so sound from your recordings is usually pretty bad.  This camera is a waste of time and money, I want to take it back soo bad but I think I'm past the 90 day return. :(

Reviews.Title: Dont buy it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: James Weigel
Reviews.Content: This thing take's terrible photos! They are blurry and sometimes make subjects look oily. Indoors the photos come out with a yellow tint or too dark. Outside the photos were more acceptable, but my old sony 4.1 MP does a better job!!! I HATE this thing, I am back to using my old camera and this one is going back to the store!

Reviews.Title: Great Price & Quality
Reviews.Author: Eugene A. Vaccaro Jr. "Eav10bB"
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend has been wanting this camera for a very long time. With Amazon's great price reduction on the product made it possible. The camera came on time and it did not disappoint, the quality and the ease of use is fantastic for new camera users. I recommend this camera to anyone who is new to photography.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: M. GABRIEL "AYOBA"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a friend, and she was totally satisfied with the quality of pictures and the ease of use.  great camera and great price.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Camera
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I Completely Hate this Camera. It takes decent pictures with an abundant amount of light, but when it comes to settings with lowlight, the pictures turn out to be completely horrible. The Main Problem that I have with this Camera is that it does a poor job at capturing pictures with people. At Night,the camera causes the appearance of people to be pasty and make their skin tone to be overly yellow and unnatural. Don't even consider buying this camera. It's a complete waste of money. If you're set on buying a Sony Cyber-shot, buy any other model than this. I've had 2 other Cyber-shots than this and although they're an older model, they completely take much better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Sony EVER!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Costa
Reviews.Content: Soooo disappointed!! I always bought sony, not even think about it, the only problem that i has was loosing it or drop it. But this camera has the worst picture quality that i ever saw!! How Sony could do this to their loyal customers?? I cant returned because its beeing more than 5 months, and i didnt use that much at this time, but now that im using every day really sucks.. i cant believe it, its really a BAD BAD BAD CAMERA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Not to mention the video.. gosh.. i cant see anything!! its all blury and with horrible quality.. just sucks, not even 1 star.

Reviews.Title: sony cybershot
Reviews.Author: Shawn Johnson
Reviews.Content: with in one week the camera stopped working. Datavision said to send it back at my expense! I decided to send it to Sony Texas repair station, they replaced the lens assembly at no charge. Bottom line it cost me 10 dollars to ship it anyway and my daughters xmas gift was delayed for 2 weeks. I might just have bad luck?

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: shirley
Reviews.Content: en general es una buena cámara se pueden tomar fotos semipanoramicas y trae todos los accesorios originales ademas se cumplió con el tiempo de entrega

Reviews.Title: Flash is terrible
Reviews.Author: Donnie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reading poor reviews on Amazon.  I should have paid attention to the reviewers.  When I use the flash, subjects become extremely washed out (shining) or else their skin looks waxy.  I wish I had never bought it.

Reviews.Title: Takes horrible pictures
Reviews.Author: jrgreen2005
Reviews.Content: This camera takes horrible pictures!  Pictures taken indoors come out with a yellowish tint.  The camera makes people's faces oily and washed out.  I have had to retake the same picture three times to get this camera to take a decent one.  I do not recommend this camera to anyone.  There are other cheap digital cameras that take decent pictures.  This Sony is not one of them!

Reviews.Title: do not buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Nathan Mahaffey "nat3han"
Reviews.Content: I am a former fan of sony cameras. I owned a previous generation sony cybershot with the Carl Zeiss lens and absolutely loved that camera. It was probably the most wonderful electronic device I've ever purchased. Sadly, I dropped it and broke it. :( So naturally I bought another sony cybershot, only this time I was a little short on cash and decided to buy the more economic model with the sony lens. This camera turned out to be the worst electronic device I have ever purchased. A previous review in this thread speaks to the mixed reviews of this camera and states that this camera is capable of taking good photos. It is true, this camera is capable of taking good photos 1 out of every 50 photos you take. The previous review also leads you to believe that the only flaw is that the camera is prone to taking blurred photos. This is not true. To me this camera takes extremely low quality photos, and I don't mean pixelated. The colors are horrible, the lighting is horrible, this camera is horrible. Please believe me when I say, for a camera in this price range you should buy another brand... any other brand, or upgrade to the Zeiss lens. I will not be purchasing any more sony cameras because, to me, a company should have a consistent level of quality in its top of the line as well as economic products.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera, except for the pictures
Reviews.Author: B. Johnson "birthdayboy"
Reviews.Content: This camera had everything i wanted, slim pocket-sized, sleek look, all the right features & specs. One BIG problem though - it consistently takes pictures of horrible quality - blurry, out of focus, bad colors, terrible in low light. No matter what I tried; changing the settings, ISO, etc... nothing helped. I could not for the life of me get one good picture out of this camera. Now, please listen, instead of buying this Sony Camera, look at the Canon PowerShot SD1200IS, for about the same $, but a great camera. A little heavier maybe, but takes great pictures in the auto mode. Almost all good reviews too, which is rare.

Reviews.Title: Terrible picture quality! Everything has a yellow tint to it
Reviews.Author: Melissa from NY
Reviews.Content: I see on here that there are good reviews and bad reviews for this camera, which I can actually understand.I didn't notice any problems at first. Sometimes, the camera takes amazing, clear pictures.  However, other times, the pictures come out horrible! Outside when it is sunny, or inside when there is lots of light, people's faces come out with an "oily" "painted" look to them- trust me, it ruins the picture.  This happens when it is dark as well.I have taken pictures in bars, pool halls, restaurants, in my kitchen, etc., and each time, the pictures come out "funky"- everything looks yellow being one of the most common problems! It is very frustrating because occasionally pictures do come out fine, but it's really a gamble as to when they will be good or bad.  I think that's why some people rate the camera 5 stars is because of that, maybe they don't take as many pictures and haven't noticed any "yellow" pictures yet.  But I take a lot of pictures in different places and I have noticed this problem happen over and over!I will admit the camera is a nice size, looks good and is easy to use- but it's not worth buying because so many of your picutres will eventually come out oily, yellow, blurry, or too dark/light.

Reviews.Title: Not so hot
Reviews.Author: R. Bliss "rb"
Reviews.Content: So after much time spent looking at reviews and all different kinds of sony cameras, I decided to get the sony w180 camera. I ignored all the posts about the picture quality and design of the camera because so many people said the pictures were fine. I'm not a big picture person, but I compared it with a 4 year old sony camera that was only 7 megapixels and probably not near as many features, and I could tell an obvious difference between the picture quality and lighting. The quality was worse, and the lighting was off, not to mention had a yellow hue. What i ignored when looking at the reviews is the importance of the "Carl Zeiss" lens. The sony lens is far inferior, so just go ahead and pay for the next step up to get the Carl Zeiss lens. I went back and got the w230 and it's great. Hope this helps.This is a shout out to all the men that want to make their girl happy the first time around...

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: J. Williamson
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use it...a little disappointed with background in focus with subject out of focus (probably user error)...overall I am satisfied with the value and portability of my purchase of the "Point-n-shoot camera"

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah D. Trovillion "ladybug"
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for my son for Christmas.  It is small and easily fits in a pocket, which is perfect for him. The camera is easy to use and the picture quality is good for a camera in this price range.  I would recomment it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: R. Delanoy
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera; it's a terrific value, and the camera is incredibly easy to use.  Even my techno-savvy brothers were impressed by some of the features.  I've been very happy with the picture quality too.  Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: M. DePaul "M. Kay"
Reviews.Content: I would never recommend this camera to anyone!  It is not worth even $10. I purchased 2 for Christmas gifts. One was defective at the get go and returned for a full refund.  The second has been in use for the past 6 weeks. My duaghter went to have the first pictures developed, and the quality is the worst I have ever seen. You would think it was the memory card, but there are pictures from another camera on the same card, and those pictures are fine- I would give it a negative rating if I could. I have owned many cameras in my lifetime, and this is absolutely the worst. I get better pictures on disposable cameras.  It is too late to return to Amazon, but I will be contacting Sony to see if they can do anything.

Reviews.Title: Buy a different Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Rossi
Reviews.Content: This one doesn't have a Carl Zeiss lenz, and it shows in the picture quality.  Also, max resolution for video is 320, not 640 like the other ones I have used. (I have used 5 others)  It's not bad for the price, but I wouldn't get another one.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jipeng Li
Reviews.Content: The quality of pictures are very disappointed. My old canon sd1000 took much better pictures than this one. The quality of video is also not good.

Reviews.Title: This camera takes really BAD pictures.
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after losing my Sony P200 (which I liked very much).  By appearances the camera looked good, and it was compact and simple to use.  The problem came when you actually took a picture.  I had read in another review that the 180 made pictures look "oily".  I really didn't give this review much thought until looking at the pictures I took.  In addition to poor low light (indoor) pictures, many of the pictures did in fact have an "oily" appearance.  Faces looked as if individuals had been working up a sweat at the gym.  This also occurred in pictures not containing people, for instance, wood also had an oily appearance.  I might have tolerated the poor indoor picture quality, but the weird oily pictures were too much.  I took the camera back and purcahsed a Canon SD1200 IS, with which I am totally satisfied.  If you want decent pictures, I'd look at something other than the Sony DSC180.

Reviews.Title: Great Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Wilder
Reviews.Content: This little camera fits in a pocket and takes excellent photos. It will also take movies. It's very handy to have around and extremely easy to use.

Reviews.Title: poor tin construction,
Reviews.Author: TomKNoid "thenoidmaster"
Reviews.Content: Camera fell off coffee table onto rug floor, lens no longer worked, camera useless after 2 weeks. Not the quality one would expect from Sony.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Muhammad Fayez Aziz
Reviews.Content: its a very nice camera,smart and easy to handle,the result is very clear and good

Reviews.Title: Broken camera
Reviews.Author: Dyno Don
Reviews.Content: I never really liked the camera that much. Bought it at Costco where I was advised it had a great lens. Some pic quality was excellent but to me it seemed inconsistent. Admittedly I am a novice.  The telephoto adjustment was very difficult to use and 2 years 5 months later the telephoto lens stopped working mechanically and the camera froze up. It's disposed of now.I haven't been impressed with Sony's overpriced products for some time now. It seems Sony lost it's quality and customer focus and become a mirror of every other American company- quarter to quarter results only please.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Jhann J. Carrillo
Reviews.Content: the camera is very good. shows photos with good quality, has duable battery and you can use it anywhere. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Mayra Soriano Suriel "DarkWolf"
Reviews.Content: Great product!I just love my purchase, i always end up as a happy customer, of course i mostly but from sellers fulfilled by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: the product met my expectations
Reviews.Author: Roberto Gusti
Reviews.Content: the product met my expectations I am happy with my purchase. is fast stable and elegant. recommend to the amazon community

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Dottie "Dorothy Joyner"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for several years now and it works great.  I take pictures of the wedding cakes I have made and delivered and all pictures have turned out great.  I will buy again when I need another camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures indoor and out doors , very easy to handle and not very bulky so easy to store in your pocket or purse for the ladies

Reviews.Title: This camera is one of the best investments ever!
Reviews.Author: Gilbert L. Jones
Reviews.Content: My youth group uses this camera to publish their quarterly newspaper.They like it very much and there have not been any compaliants

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Widhalm
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras for my 10 & 12 yr old daughters.  It was easy for them to use, great picture/video quality, and they have lasted years.  I would buy this camera again (just haven't needed to).

Reviews.Title: Moms Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom and she loves it. Still uses it to this day. Small, reliable and long battery life. You can't ask for much more out a camera.

Reviews.Title: Buena camara
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Medrano "Gerardo Medrano"
Reviews.Content: Esta camara toma excelentes fotos en el dia, colores vivos, nitidez de imagen. No la recomiendo para tomas de noche. Es mejor que la DSC-W650 que compre recientemente.

Reviews.Title: great simple camera
Reviews.Author: M. Ono "ironmiso"
Reviews.Content: This is a great simple point-and-shoot. It's a great bargain for $80. However, for high-end functions, check out the revolutionally Sony RX100 for the best point-and-shoot.

Reviews.Title: SONY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Not the greatest camera; worked well the first few months then lens door broke followed by too much green tint in photos

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Q "Q"
Reviews.Content: This product is perfect for what it can do and for the price.  This is why I gave it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: J. A. Acosta Sarmiento
Reviews.Content: excellent product. Recommend purchase. Good finish and design. I am going to try other products from the same brand.Thank you

Reviews.Title: LISTO
Reviews.Author: alexsf
Reviews.Content: LIS  PERFECTO  BUENA  CALIDAD  CON FORME  CON LA  COMPRA  GRACIAS  POR  MANTNER  TAN  BUEN SERVICIO  EN  SUS  TIENDAS Y  QUE  SIGAN CRESIENDO COMO LA  MEJOR  TIENDA

Reviews.Title: perfecto
Reviews.Author: Diego Piedra
Reviews.Content: en buen estado, esta como nueva, me gusto por que cumplio con lo prometido. y llego en buen tiempo.gracias

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera, and they sell it really cheap!
Reviews.Author: Ashish Kushwaha
Reviews.Content: I already had used this camera - just flawless, but I lost it, so I was looking for another one, and bam! I found a seller with the cheapest price! And there was no defect.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: AndreaR
Reviews.Content: Bottom line: I ALWAYS ENDED UP LOOKING LIKE A WAX FIGURE. All yellow and shiny. Nothing great about it besides I accidentally poured water on it and it still survived.

Reviews.Title: Don not buy the camera.
Reviews.Author: B Roy "B Roy"
Reviews.Content: The camera is difficult to use, and unless you really spend time setting up the camera to get a great shot, and use a tripod, you will hate the results.  The other reason I give it one star is the durability.  You cannot drop this camera even once.  If you do, the camera will break.  Either the battery door will stop retaining the batteries, or the shock of the fall will cause the electronics to fail.  Three feet to the pavement and that is all it takes.

Reviews.Title: Having buyers remorse
Reviews.Author: Becky Lee
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my camera and thought that a nice point and shoot would fit my needs. WRONG!!! After reading the reviews I purchased this camera. The first time I used it was on a trip to Las Vegas. The flash is HORRIBLE!!!! It makes everyone look yellow and blurry. I tried the other settings to see if it would make a difference and nothing worked. I have not been able to find a way to correct the problem in my photo editing program either. Had great shots ruined that I had to turn black and white to save. This would be a great camera if you don't plan on using the flash.I have learned my lesson and will never buy a point and shoot camera again.

Reviews.Title: Not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Conner C. Mcdaniel
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera guru, so I didn't think very hard about picture quality when buying this camera. I figured in this day and age no matter what camera you get it's going to take reasonable pictures. That was a false assumption on my part. This camera does not take satisfactory pictures, especially in motion. I had a Canon that was several years dated, the same basic size and took better pictures. Along with that, Sony cameras now greatly frustrate me. Their batteries, memory cards, USB cords, battery chargers, and pretty much any other accessory you can imagine is different for almost every camera. It's always difficult to find what you need on the go and the memory card is hardly adaptable with anything. If I could go back in time I wouldn't have bought this camera, and won't be buying more Sony cameras. By the way, I am not a generally anal consumer, and this is the first product I've bought on Amazon that I was unsatisfied with.

Reviews.Title: BIg bang for the buck...
Reviews.Author: John Huckaby
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful little camera.  It takes AWESOME pictures overall and I am very pleased with it.  The only reason I couldn't really give it 5 stars is I would like a more powerful zoom on it.  3x just don't really cut it much.  Just like virtually all other digital cameras it requires ALOT of light for the best pictures.  Using the flash will almost always result in red eye pic's but that is just the nature of the beast.I HIGHLY recommend this camera for a starter camera that is virtually idiot proof and great for beginner's.

Reviews.Title: Great first camera.
Reviews.Author: DarnHeather
Reviews.Content: I picked up this camera for my daughter for $90 on sale.  She is 9 and had some birthday money so she paid for half.  She is very excited to have a "real" camera finally as opposed to the disposable point and shoot cameras we always gave her before.  We are going to Japan on vacation soon and I wanted photos from her perspective.  It is very easy for her to use and she likes the red color.  I love that it came with a rechargeable battery but wasn't thrilled that it needed a special Sony memory card.  However the memory card plugs right in to our computer so she can download the photos that way or through the cord that came with it.  It also came with cables to plug it into the t.v. for direct video play but we haven't tried that yet.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Marcaletti "jmar54"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my wife and she loves it!  Really easy to use.  Amazing Quality!  Fast shipping.  Have fun taking great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Decent pocket camera
Reviews.Author: M "that's me"
Reviews.Content: I've had this thing for a week or so as a replacement for the DSC-P92 which (after loaning it to my daughter for a field trip, had it's lens gears stripped when forced closed on a low battery situation...oh well).  Fortunately, Best Buy was running a deal on the black model, Lowepro bag for it's size, and a 4GB Memory Stick Pro for $130.  Since my DSLR Sony uses the same memory, I swapped the $19.95 card for an open item second battery.  For the wife and kids, quick snap shot needs, you can't beat the camera/price!  It will take 10 MP pictures with ease but I find my self using the PGM mode to control ISO, etc.  The camera captures only in JPG (as far as I can figure) so the images need to be in focus for the picture to be its best.  Sometimes the flash is too bright but fortunately you can set it to its lowest intensity and things work out well, especially when doing sync flash (SL) for fore- and background illumination.  This is the small pocket camera I'll carry when the DSLR bag is far to much for the event.  For the price, you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: G. L. Elizondo
Reviews.Content: Its a nice camera, easy to use and handle. The only thing I don't like too much is the auto focus, it takes to long.

Reviews.Title: Worst picture quality
Reviews.Author: A. Gupta
Reviews.Content: Though I didn't find any reviews on any site about this camera, I bought this camera thinking that Sony makes best camera.Bad points-1- Picture quality is horrible. There was no sharpness in the picture.2- Lenses make loud weird noise when you click a picture.Good Points-Camera is sleek and compact, easy to use.Look wise its great.As soon as i got this camera, i clicked around 50 pictures with auto mode. None of them were good. I tried all settings and mode but in vain. Video quality was very bad.I returned this camera to Amazon next day itself. I would not recommend anyone to buy this camera. Now i know why did i not see any reviews on any site(may be no one bought this camera).

Reviews.Title: best deal EVER
Reviews.Author: msaborio "msd"
Reviews.Content: This has been the single better purchase of my life... this camera for 100 bucks doesn't even make any sense! Go for it if you are the kind of photographer that just point and shoot without fancy or technical stuff (Like me :)

Reviews.Title: christmas present
Reviews.Author: Courtney Pellegrino "courtney"
Reviews.Content: great product that i bought 4 my elderly father and he was easily able to figure it out..

Reviews.Title: Muy buena y sencilla camara
Reviews.Author: pablo godoy
Reviews.Content: Esta camara ha resultado ser una muy buena compra, es una camara muy facil de usar, en efecto la utiliza mi padre que tiene 70 años y no tiene ningun problema, No es una camara para profesionales, es una camara caseros para fotos de diario, la recomiendo 100%

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Demiko Dracket
Reviews.Content: Great pics! Good battery life! Overall a great camera! Nice viewing screen! No problems so far!

Reviews.Title: takes forever and a year to take a picture
Reviews.Author: Henry Jones Jr. "average shopper"
Reviews.Content: I have owned a previous Sony and loved it, but this camera is terrible.  It takes 2 to 3 seconds to take a picture.  It is unnatural to use.  Just like the other Sony and Cannon cameras, you put your finger on the button, and it focuses and is ready to go, right?  Wrong.  You depress the button further and it takes another 2 seconds to click. I can't get good pictures of my kids since its too slow.  I am going to give this one away and buy a better camera.  I should have listened to the other raters on Amazon who rated this camera a pass.  These reviews are never wrong in aggregate.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for easy pics
Reviews.Author: Shobhit
Reviews.Content: Its really nice to have this camera for easy use, like your mom or your wife can easily use it without any problem or menu knowledge. Most of the imp features are on the 4 way navigation  button. The picture are also very good.really worth in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Ughh.
Reviews.Author: Asma K. Siddiqui "Hihipuffyamiyumi"
Reviews.Content: Okay so, I agree with the other person who reviewed this, this camera isn't good at all. The pictures come out really weird, & not clear. it makes your face look oily & blurred. The camera looks great, but when the picture comes out bad, its not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Traveller
Reviews.Content: This camera looks very very good, is solid, well built and it is a Sony. I bought it because of those factors. But - the quality of the pictures is horrible, even compared to cameras in the same $100 price range.Photos made with flash are often overexposed or blurry or grainy. This is not because of the settings, because there is really not too much to set in this camera.Pictures made in full sun are also low quality, which was a surprise to me.The camera stores pics on the Sony memory stick, which is not compatible with anything.I had this camera for three days and returned to store. I am not looking at any of Sony products.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Herrera
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it first came out, I paid $400 or more for it right off the truck. It was worth every penny, and makes other digital cameras look like they came out of a bubble gum machine. Seriously, unless you want a lens camera, (you know the bulky type), get this one, or the most recent model of this.And for those that question the image quality...I have been able to view the photos on a 52 inch plasma with 1080HP and they are crystal clear and sharp, even the video quality is better than my 2005 digital camcorder.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: Pablo J. Yac Castro
Reviews.Content: this is the best choice for my live, the camera is incredible, and very low price

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Evans
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived quickly.  It takes great pics and is very userfriendly to download pics to my computer.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Kady Leibovitz
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my aunt.  She really likes it.  She had a Sony camera before she knew how to use it already.  No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: sony cybershot DSC-W180
Reviews.Author: Kornelius Waluyo
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my dad. he doesnt really know tech things. this camera works really simple, and he easily can use it. thanks Sony!

Reviews.Title: Product is not great
Reviews.Author: Prakash Koruttu "ksp"
Reviews.Content: Sony Cybershot DSC-W180 10.1MP Digital Camera with 3x SteadyShot Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)Camera is not that much great.  When I took the picture without Flash Memory Card, picture came good.  When I used Flash Memory Card, the quality of the picture did not come good.  Shipping was great.  The product is worth for the cost.  Unfortunately the camera is in India, otherwise I would have returned back.

Reviews.Title: Very simple, but nice results
Reviews.Author: P. Orosz "PO"
Reviews.Content: Cheap and usefull at the same time.I recommend this camera for people that just want to point and shot.Cons; doesnt have several easy access picture modes, but is increadible easy for my mother use.

Reviews.Title: Chunty Camera Ever!! Buy a SAMSUNG instead
Reviews.Author: Gift Card Recipient "Lucho"
Reviews.Content: I bought a sony DSC-180. It was terrible. Picture quality was awful. I want to imagine camera was defective. People's faces looked like plastic dolls after a day at the beach!! :) I couldn't believe I had problems AGAIN!!! with a sony product. I bought a PC sony 5 years ago. I had to sell it in parts after 14 months. It was useless. Now again. I had to return this camera. Chunty camera ever. Bought a SAMSUNG instead.

Reviews.Title: sony cyber shot
Reviews.Author: Clown1957 "lone wolf"
Reviews.Content: i highly recommend sony cyber shot to anyone that needs a new camera, it takes great videos and it's very easy to use

ProductInfo.Features:
Smile Shutter technology automatically captures a smile
Face Detection technology captures faces naturally
SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce blur
Scene Selection modes adjust for shooting conditions
10.1 megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W180 10.1MP Digital Camera with 3x SteadyShot Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Silver)
